data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of North Darfur, Sudan.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of North Darfur, Sudan

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in North Darfur, Sudan to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of North Darfur to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of North Darfur against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Maalia people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, help the 6,128 believers in North Darfur to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 1,577,072 lost friends and neighbors.
Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 1,583,200 people living in North Darfur.
Father, make bold the prophets in North Darfur, Sudan so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

location.name: North Darfur
location.people_groups_list: Lahawin, Baggara, Selim, Dubasiyin, Mimi, Amdang, Birgid, Arabized
